page.title: 08 A SCHOOL DAY.
page.content: On a school day I wake between 7 and 8 am.Breakfast consists of cereal or toast and fried food.School starts at 9am. Morning break between lessons consists of a quarter of an hour,with a similar one in the afternoon. Dinner is one hour.School ends at 3.30 pm.Having changed school uniform,I go to the shop for the "News"(local paper). When I have had tea it is 5.30pm.I will then watch television or play with friends or read a book. Supper is a snack eaten an hour before bed,which is about 10pm. In the evenings I often have homework to do.This should take about an hour. I enjoy school because I am with friends.However, it is a very noisy and busy place and I find it difficult sometimes to get privacy.
